info.name: ZohoWriter Documentation V1
info.description:
Writer is an online word processor that lets users create, edit and format documents and work with other people simultaneously. We have now organized our APIs (Application Programming Interface) around REST, so that developers can integrate their existing apps or build new apps that can be integrated with Writer.
https://zoho.com/writer/help/api
Modified Date: Sep 27,2018

item.name: Document API
01. Create/Upload Documents

formdata.description: Mandatory - {File} - Provide the required content in your API request body.
Mandatory - {String} Provide the filename to create document in this name.
Optional - { String } Provide the folder id of the folder to where the document to be created.

request.description: To create document with content parameter. The document will be created along with the content that you provided in the request body.

response.name: E1 - R5012 Unsupported Parameter found

formdata.description: Mandatory - {String} - Specify the web URL, through which the document will be created.
Optional - {String} Provide the filename to create blank document in this name.

item.description: You can use the create document API to create a new blank document or a document with content. Also, provide a filename parameter in your API request to create a document with the required name. A blank untitled document will be created if you don't specify any params.

item.name: 02. Get list of documents with specified parameter

query.description: Optional - { Integer } - Set document limit and retrieve the list of documents within the specified limit. If it is not given, 10 documents will be returned default.
Optional - { Integer } - Set document offset and retrieve the list of documents from the specified offset.
Optional - { timestamp} - Set time in milliseconds to retrive list of documents from specified time.

Optional - {String} - [ created_time |modified_time |lastopened_time ]
1. created_time -
Get the list of documents with respect to the document created time.
2. modified_time -
Get the list of documents with respect to the last modified time of the document.
3. lastopened_time -
Get the list of documents with respect to the last opened time.
Default date format: IS08601

Optional - {String}
 [ all| shared_to_me|favourite| published| owned_by_me]
1. all - to retrive all owned and shared documents
2. shared_to_me - to retrive only shared to me documents
3. owned_by_me - to retrive only owned documents
4. favourite - to retrive all favourited documents
5. published - to retrive all published documents

request.description: To retrive the list of documents based on the parameters.

response.name: 01. 200 Get List of Documents

query.description: Optional - { Integer } - Set document limit and retrieve the list of documents within the specified limit. If it is not given, 10 documents will be returned default.
Optional - { Integer } - Set document offset and retrieve the list of documents from the specified offset.
Optional - { timestamp} - Set time in milliseconds to retrive list of documents from specified time.

Optional - {String} - [ created_time |modified_time |lastopened_time ]
created_time -
Get the list of documents with respect to the document created time.
modified_time -
Get the list of documents with respect to the last modified time of the document.
lastopened_time -
Get the list of documents with respect to the last opened time.
Default date format: IS08601

Optional - {String} [ all|shared_to_me|favourite|published|owned_by_me]
all - to retrive all owned and shared documents
shared_to_me - to retrive only shared to me documents
owned_by_me - to retrive only owned documents
favourite - to retrive all favourited documents
published - to retrive all published documents

query.description:
Mandatory - {String}  Specify the format of the document to be downloaded.
Supported file formats - .docx .odt .rtf .txt .html .pdf.

request.description: The Writer API allows to download docs that are stored in your Writer account. You can download files in .docx, .odt, .rtf, .txt, .html, .pdf formats. To download document, you should make an authorized HTTP GET request by including the document_id and format parameters. The document will be downloaded in .docx format by default if you don't specify this parameter in your API request.

item.description:
Zoho Writer’s conversion API lets you easily integrate document conversion functionality to web applications and content management systems. The conversion API allows you to convert a file format (say docx) to another file format (say pdf or text). The API accepts the document source as "Text" and "Web URL" for conversion to any file format supported by Zoho Writer.

Supported file formats: .docx .odt .rtf .txt .html .pdf
